description: This table contains free-text documentation regarding patient prep special needs.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PREP_SPEC_NEEDS_TXT
columns.description: This free-text item is used to document special patient preparation requirements for this case.
